import React from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { Formik, Field } from "formik"; import * as Yup from "yup"; const validationSchema = Yup.object().shape({ name: Yup.string().required("Le nom est obligatoire"), lastname: Yup.string().required("Le prénom est obligatoire"), username: Yup.string().required("Le nom d'utilisateur est obligatoire"), phone: Yup.string().required("Le numéro de téléphone est obligatoire"), email: Yup.string() .email(`L'adresse email n'est pas valide`) .required("L'adresse email est obligatoire"), password: Yup.string().required( "Le mot de passe doit contenir au moins 8 caractères" ), }); export default function LoginSection() { const handleSubmit = (e) => { const formData = {}; if ( e.target.name.value && e.target.lastname.value && e.target.username.value && e.target.phone.value && e.target.email.value && e.target.password.value ) { formData["name"] = e.target.name.value; formData["lastanme"] = e.target.lastanme.value; formData["username"] = e.target.username.value; formData["phone"] = e.target.phone.value; formData["email"] = e.target.email.value; formData["password"] = e.target.password.value; } axios.post("http://localhost:4000/user", formData).then((res) => { e.target.name.value = ""; e.target.lastanme.value = ""; e.target.username.value = ""; e.target.phone.value = ""; e.target.email.value = ""; e.target.password.value = ""; }); e.preventDefault() }; return ( <>

); }
